spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are highly accurate. Minor deductions for the scaling of Bed-4 which appears slightly more elongated than the plan, and the toilet fixture orientation in the bottom-most bathroom.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof is correctly removed with all internal walls visible. Model is floating correctly. 1 point deducted for a faint text-like smudge visible in the central hallway bathroom area. No major structural reinterpretations found.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture items (sofas, rug, dining table, beds) map nearly 1:1 with the reference. Kitchen counter geometry accurately reflects the 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Effective low-poly aesthetic with flat colors. Isometric camera angle is correct. Lighting is soft, though some shadows are slightly more pronounced than purely flat shading, but it maintains the required non-photorealistic feel.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in Bed-4 proportions.
Faint hallucinated text label/artifact remains in the central C.TOI bathroom area.
